snippet.title: Not The Robots Trailer, a stealth roguelike about eating furniture
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/257120 
Follow us on Twitter - http://twitter.com/tinyBuild
Like us on Facebook - http://facebook.com/tinyBuildGAMES

Not The Robots is a game about hiding and eating furniture in a procedurally generated office building. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux. It's developed by 2DArray and published by tinyBuild.

http://nottherobots.com
